title: New: GEMS – Medusa
content:
GEMS are hands down one of 2013’s best new bands.

The DC duo are set to release their debut EP in December, and have just made the title track available for streaming. Medusa is perhaps their boldest work to date, building on the languid dream-pop of their early offerings, it’s driven by the sensual, deeply emotive vocals.

‘I used to feel so free / the way we used to be / time got away from me’

If you’re heading to CMJ next week, then make sure you don’t miss GEMS.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
